description.main_subject: Video game scene with an elderly NPC and dialogue interface
description.detailed_description: An isometric view of a charming, hand-drawn video game environment features an elderly character, 'The Elder,' standing on a cobblestone path at a crossroads. A stone fountain and lush green foliage with scattered flowers surround the path, while a dialogue box presents a welcome message and interactive options to the player. The scene is brightly lit, conveying a peaceful and inviting atmosphere.
description.text_content:
The Elder
THE ELDER
A gentle welcome
Close
Welcome, traveler. This town holds pieces of Yash's journey. Where would you like to go?
Tell me about Yash
Show me his projects
What skills does he have?
How can I contact him?
I'll explore on my own
N
